item.title: Browser Extension Development
item.description: Web extensions or browser plugins is a way to improve browser functionalities. The following examples summarize the different scopes they can have. no-script - to block script served from not-trusted domains ublock Origin - it is “a wide-spectrum blocker” dark-mode - it changes the appearance of web pages React Developer Tools - to inspect react-specific properties of a page that makes use of React.
